name: 2D Platformer - Super Space-Stronaut (coxjude)
description:
2D Platformer - Super Space-Stronaut

Modifications

1) Changed custom level to be longer, more robust and challenging

2) Added custom player behavior to custom level, altering the PlayerController script to give the player increased jump height and jump power

3) Added custom music to Level 2, produced and mixed by me.

Credits:

Game by Jude Cox

Lo-Fi Funk Beat by JUDAS (Jude Cox)
